content.raw:
Ok, that makes sense. At the moment we don't have a good way of specifying the depth clipping distances through SDF though, so we were using hardcoded values. Do you prefer hardcoding or copying the camera clipping?

I'd also point out that even though the camera image may see beyond the point cloud, those pixels won't have any points to color. So it's useful if someone is subscribing just to the RGB image, but not useful for anyone using the combined RGBD data.
